articles.author: Kevin Fallon
articles.title: Wayne LaPierre Re-Elected as NRA Chief at Beleaguered Convention - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Days after the Texas massacre, LaPierre pledged to “defend Second Amendment freedom for all law-abiding Americans.”
articles.content: National Rifle Association CEO Wayne LaPierre was overwhelmingly re-elected to his position as head of the controversial guns-rights organization, amid national outrage over gun violence. There were … [+863 chars]
